creator: scottweaver@cinci.rr.com
text:
This really isn't a bug so much as something to watch out for, a "gotcha" if 
you will.  When installing IBM VisualAge for Java Enterprise, this entry is 
added to the classpath: C:\IBM Connectors\classes.  The problem here in lies 
with the fact that VAJ adds it without " " around the entry which contains 
blank spaces.  When running the ant.bat I kept getting a NoClassDefinitionFound 
exception.  It took me a half an hour to notice the blank space in the system 
classpath and subsequently put the requisite " " around the entry.  This fixed 
the problem and the ant test ran fine.  

This maybe something you might want to add to the documentation just help 
developers avoid confusion and the mandatory banging of the head against the 
proverbeal wall.

Regards,
Scott T. Weaver
